<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' href='../xslt/ResourceMetadataDescription.xsl'?>
<ResourceMetadataDescription Name="UserStory" CanCreate="true" CanUpdate="true" CanDelete="true" IndexUri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/index/meta" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/UserStories" Description="A statement of end user requirements in a couple of sentences. User Story can be assigned to Iteration or Release.">
  <ResourceMetadataHierarchyDescription>
    <ResourceMetadataBaseResourceDescription>
      <ResourceMetadataBaseResourceItemDescription Name="Assignable" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Assignables/meta" />
    </ResourceMetadataBaseResourceDescription>
    <ResourceMetadataDerivedResourceDescription>
      <ResourceMetadataDerivedResourceItemDescription />
    </ResourceMetadataDerivedResourceDescription>
  </ResourceMetadataHierarchyDescription>
  <ResourceMetadataPropertiesDescription>
    <ResourceMetadataPropertiesResourceValuesDescription>
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Id" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Int32" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Entity ID" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Int32/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Name" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="true" Type="String" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Entity name or title" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/String/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Description" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="String" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Entity description" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/String/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="StartDate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Start date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="EndDate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="End date for time-boxed entities such as Iteration, Project, Release" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="CreateDate" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Entity creation date" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="ModifyDate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Last time entity was modified" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="LastCommentDate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Last comment date" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Tags" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="String" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Comma-separated list tags" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/String/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="NumericPriority" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Double" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Calculated priority of entity" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Double/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="EntityVersion" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Int64" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Version of the entity" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Int64/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="IsNow" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Boolean" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="true" Description="True if entity start date is in the past and end date is in the future" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Boolean/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="IsNext" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Boolean" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="true" Description="True if entity is not in the past and is not current" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Boolean/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="IsPrevious" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Boolean" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="true" Description="True if entity is in the past" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Boolean/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Effort" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Total efforts for assignable." Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="EffortCompleted" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Effort spent on assignment." Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="EffortToDo" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Effort required to complete assignment." Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Progress" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Percent done for assignable" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="TimeSpent" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Total time spent on assignment. Read-only calculated field" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="TimeRemain" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Total time remaining to complete assignment for Role. Read-only calculated field" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="LastStateChangeDate" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Last time entity changed state" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="PlannedStartDate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Planned Start date for time-boxed entities such as Assignable, Project or Impediment" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="PlannedEndDate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Planned End date for time-boxed entities such as Assignable, Project or Impediment" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Units" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="String" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Units of measure for velocity" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/String/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="LeadTime" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Double" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="true" Description="Number of days between assignable create date and end date" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Double/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="CycleTime" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Double" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="true" Description="Number of days between assignable start date and end date" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Double/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="ForecastEndDate" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="DateTime" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="true" Description="End date predicted on current progress if elapsed time is greater than one week and progress is greater than 10%" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/DateTime/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="InitialEstimate" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Decimal" IsTypeComplex="false" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Initially estimated user story effort" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Decimal/meta" IsBoundToParent="true" />
    </ResourceMetadataPropertiesResourceValuesDescription>
    <ResourceMetadataPropertiesResourceReferencesDescription>
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="EntityType" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="EntityType" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Type of entity e.g. Bug, Feature, Task, etc." Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/EntityTypes/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />

      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Owner" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="GeneralUser" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Will be deprecated.       <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Creator" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="GeneralUser" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Person who created entity" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/GeneralUsers/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="LastCommentedUser" CanSet="false" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="GeneralUser" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Last commented user" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/GeneralUsers/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />

      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Iteration" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Iteration" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Assignable entity can be assigned to Iteration" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Iterations/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />

Use AssignedTeams instead." Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Teams/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />

For example, User Story can have Must Have or Nice To Have priority " Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Priorities/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="EntityState" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="true" Type="EntityState" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="State of Assignable. For example, User Story can be in Open or Done state" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/EntityStates/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />

      <ResourceFieldMetadataDescription Name="Build" CanSet="true" CanGet="true" IsDeprecated="false" IsRequired="false" Type="Build" IsTypeComplex="true" IsSynthetic="false" Description="Build where this user story is found" Uri="https://test.tpondemand.com/api/v1/Builds/meta" IsBoundToParent="false" />
